title: baalE paripaalisow
sahitya:
bAlE paripAlisau sushIlE



anupallavi



 bAlEndu phAlE bhaktajana pAlE



caraNam 1



ghananaya dEshikAdi sangIta manjuLa kalAdhIshvari ina shashishikhi nEtra Ishvari rAjarAjEshvari 

manurUpE mahanIya manju bhASiNi mAtangi dhanapati sakha harikEsha sati suravara vinutE ambA



caraNam 2



ghananaya dEshikAdi sangIta lOlana krpA shIlana ghanaguNa sukumAra nAlvaDi krSNa rAjEndrana

manavArE salahammA manju bhASiNi mAtangi dhanapati harikEsha sati suravara vinutE ambA
